input.sentences: pumpkins look out with their bright | freshly carved scary faces .
a cute kitty cat face emerges from the dark .
the night slowly becomes lit from the glow of the pumpkins frightful smiles .
looking on to a creativly carved puzzle piece pumplin | a piece falls from its surface .
as all seemed quiet and safe | a demon pumpkin appears from no where .
output.sentences: The annual  Halloween jack o'lantern fest is here one again
Every one participating submits a original hand carved pumpkin
There are lots of really good submissions
The judges really have their jobs cut out for them, I;m finding it hard to pic only one that I like because they are all so done
Finally the winner has been chosen  looking forward to next year event
